name: Admin Menu Blank Template Plugin
author: Mallikarjun Yawalkar

sections.description:
Admin Menu Template Plugin make plugin development easy and it is a simple, flexible and cool blank plugin template with a special menu icon and ability of menu increment and much more so the developers feels “Code is a Poetry”.

In addition to increasing the user experience for your plugin, it has also been widely reported that this blank template gives your plugin the admin area in an independent space with your very own icon.
sections.installation:
Install and Activate

  1. Unzip the downloaded Admin Menu Template Plugin zip file
  2. Upload the Admin Menu Template Plugin folder and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate Admin Menu Template Plugin from Plugins page
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin for developing plugins

well, if you have got an idea of developing a plugin for wordpress blog users, you might need this plugin to quick and kick start the development. because this plugin has already the needed and must have code in it. You simply need to add your functions and rename the default plugin names and URI’s to your’s.
